    # To be a member/user of our website, you need to be 18 years old or more.

    # You need to provide true and correct information

    # When you will purchase an item, then confirm that you agree to our terms & conditions.

    # Your payment will be processed through PayPal or other third-party websites.

    # Images showing in the preview is demo purpose only. We don’t provide image copyright. You need to replace the images included in the demo content.

    # If you face any problem to download your item after purchasing, then you can send an email from our contact page.

    # We Will refund only if the product is broken. To make sure the product is broken or not, you need to contact us.

    # As a customer or user of this website, you will need to agree with the terms & conditions.

    # If we make any change in terms & conditions, we will post here.
